page.title: 13OUR ASIAN COMMUNITY
page.content: My name is Zabina Khan. I am 10 years old. I am going to tell you the history of my family. It all started when my father came to England from Pakistan on 22nd April 1962. My father thought he would stay in Worcester with his cousins and friends.He worked in Metal Casting and Metal Box. Then in 1967 my father returned to Pakistan then in 1974 he came back to England with my mother and my elder brother.We bought a house of our own.My father then got his old job back.I was born in 1974. A man who worked with my father taught him English. When we had enough money we bought a small grocery shop. Now I have two brothers and one sister. My family is happy in England but we shall be going to Pakistan from time to time to see our relations.
